item.title: The javascript transpile dialectic part 3
item.description:
Objective

Review setup for different transpiler engines. Simple code for transpiler engines

Target Audience

Developers new to modern javascript frameworks and tooling

Source Documents

react babel
webpack

Summary

Result

See the Demo app for react
The demo code has a number of configuration options see see top level readme for general instructions. The transpile is driven via webpack and the dev server

Transpile

npm run start

Test

localhost:3000

Discussion

  1. Transpile with the dev server in development
  2. npm run bundle transpiles for production
  3. see development webpack config
  4. see babel plugin config

More Details

Babel transpiles ECMAScript 2015 to ES5. Some features of ECMAScript 2015 do not directly map to ES5. {Iterators, Proxies, generator functions } this set is not inclusive see polyfill
Webpack uses Babel to compile JavaScript into a bundle.
Webpack uses middleware
1. webpack-dev-middleware
2. webpack-hot-middleware
3. hot module replacement

see dev server lines 9 to 15
see dev server hot reload config

  • line 1 and 23 HotModuleReplacementPlugin
  • line 19 publicPath

Demo app for react

Demo app for all series parts
